pageContext.claim: “Every Democrat hates him [James Comey]. Every Republican hates him. He did a horrible job at the FBI. Speak to the real agents, the real people -- because the people in the FBI are incredible people -- not the sleaze on top.”
pageContext.analysis: Internal surveys acquired by the New York Times show Comey was well liked and respected by the rank and file FBI agents. This finding was reinforced by the testimony of former FBI officials.
